entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
